nodes.text: The Illuminated Aquean was an exclusive casino located on the resort world on Vaynai.

Massive, heavily-fortified, transparisteel fish tanks lined the walls, providing a serene source of entertainment. The casino dazzled in the night, when glow beams illuminated the colorful aquatic creatures.

The casino was operated by Amira Nasrabi during the New Order. She hired an intimidating security force composed of bulky Mon Calamari in order to protect the delicate artificial ecosystem. Nasrabi required that these guards acted with impeccable manners, so as to not frighten potential customers.
